beaches.name: Laguna Beach
beaches.description: These sandy shores are known for their clear waters, tide pools, and scenic coves, providing opportunities for sunbathing, swimming, surfing, and exploring the marine life.

beaches.name: Huntington Beach
beaches.description: Renowned worldwide as a premier surfing destination. It attracts surfers from across the globe due to its consistent waves, which are ideal for both beginners and advanced surfers.
